content.rendered:
*This item has a minimum order quantity of 6*

The Band Armchair is often used in Café’s and Restaurants but can be used in a huge variety of settings. For example, a hotel room, a waiting area or even a bar – the choice is yours. 

It complements many chairs in our Dining range. As it can be used in a wide variety of settings, it offers great value for money.

This is a high quality, commercial grade chair, which comes in selections of faux leather, fabrics, real leathers and also C.O.M.
1.5 l/m of plain fabric is needed if you’d rather not have faux leather.

Please call our office for Fabric, Leather and C.O.M. This item has a 2 year warranty. 

We work closely with a number of fabric & faux leather mills as well as leather dealers so you can customise your chair to suit you.

– Click here to browse Sunbury Design’s Fabric, Faux Leather and Real Leather ranges.

– Click here to browse Panaz’s Fabric and Faux Leather ranges.

– Click here to browse Crest JMT Leather’s range of leathers to suit all budgets!

We do not charge to upholster your chair in custom fabrics, fauxs or leathers, we only charge you what the material costs us, plus a small handling fee; which is included in the total price. If you prefer, you can purchase the material yourself and arrange for it to be delivered to our warehouse.
